lead_paragraph: KARP--Bella. January 17, 1929, died February 12, 2016. Was the beloved wife of Stanley, mother of Michael and George, grandmother of Rebecca, Aaron, Jonathan, Sam and Jacob, great grandmother of Johnna and Ruby. Survived the Holocaust in the Lodz Ghetto and Auschwitz, then made a wonderful life for herself and her family in America. Received an MSW from NYU at age 51, then worked as a geriatric social worker until her retirement. She will be greatly missed by all those she touched. Please send donations to World ORT, ort.org, or the charity of your choice. 1/3
